title: Gozie51
author: Gozie51
content: I just come across this our guy account (nelson4lov ) , I come realise say I no too dey see him post for forum and the thing just push me to check him account. I see say him no even dey forum a longtime now, for more than a year now.His last active time here na April 17, 2022, 10:01:52 PMFor the sake of being a brother's keeper, I say make I ask if anybody know what's up about nelson4lov inactive for forum abi him just take a break? Hope all is well with him?Just checking.

comments.author: MainIbem
comments.body: Quote from: Gozie51 on June 08, 2023, 11:58:49 AMI just come across this our guy account (nelson4lov ) , I come realise say I no too dey see him post for forum and the thing just push me to check him account. I see say him no even dey forum a longtime now, for more than a year now.His last active time here na April 17, 2022, 10:01:52 PMFor the sake of being a brother's keeper, I say make I ask if anybody know what's up about nelson4lov inactive for forum abi him just take a break? Hope all is well with him?Just checking.Maybe we have to locate anyone closest to him to know his situation at hand you have done well by checking on him. You know most at times not everyone has this zeal to seat and reading information from the forum then secondly after some family challenges he may decides to focused in other area of hustle to keep his family afloat.Even myself it wasn't easy with me coming back here to be active posting and reading information.Omo if your pekin and family worry you no body go tell you say make you go find way to carry survive for life and dem dey distract person too much.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: He is good the last time I got in touch with him this year, he has other things he is doing that is taking his time.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: I noticed as well and have been meaning to ask, nelson4lov was one of the people who were of help to me during my newbie days, we have conversed a couple of times on the forum and on telegram and he hasnâ€™t been active there the last time I checked. I really hope itâ€™s work thatâ€™s been keeping him off the forum and that he is doing okay.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: I no no im and weti you do op na di best of them all, na so we supposed dey ooo. All di people wey I know since wen I started using the forum e dey active. And anyone wey know another person wey e no dey active, tok am for here make we see how fairing im or her be.Then another thing wey dey bother my mine na Majestic-milf dat user e don try but no way. So im or her go nid hep. Dis user deh luk 4 ogwaja since but e never see am so how we go am

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on June 08, 2023, 02:37:42 PMHe is good the last time I got in touch with him this year, he has other things he is doing that is taking his time. This one make sense. If him dey okay and chatting another route for bread plus butter, e dey okay. Dis user deh luk 4 ogwaja since but e never see am so how we go amNo be that one be the Koko wey we dey even talk self, na about some1 wey we know far back wey never shake body for here since over a year .No too worry for that one bcos as Burna Boy talk, last last na everybody go chop breakfast.

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Na true you talk OP. Even as you share this info now I com check d user profile and then sighted April. For my mind, April nor far till date, na only two months to June. Na when I looked closely I com see sey na even April 2022 oh. It's ova a year na. Well, my happiness na wetin Charles talk sey him and Nelson reason together early this year. So I believe owa guy dey ok ðŸ‘‡Quote from: Charles-Tim on June 08, 2023, 02:37:42 PMHe is good the last time I got in touch with him this year, he has other things he is doing that is taking his time.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: OP you really do well to raise this topic. I like as we dey run theÂ  local board like this one show say we dey united here and the cooperation dey show wella.Â  E for good say we dey relate very well out side this platform make we for dey jolly for ourselvesÂ  and to dey roll good tidings for ourselves. Some of our padi men dem wey dey hereÂ  dey try well base on who dem be as dem dey show love to our fellow brothers and sisters for this ama. As our brother Charles-Tim don cap say him dey gidibam, we all agree to the fact say him talk na true. We pray make Baba GOD continue to dey bless and protect us all as we dey do our doings and dey waka our paroll. Amen.

comments.author: nelson4lov
comments.body: Quote from: Gozie51 on June 08, 2023, 11:58:49 AM~Snipped ~~For the sake of being a brother's keeper, I say make I ask if anybody know what's up about nelson4lov inactive for forum abi him just take a break? Hope all is well with him?Just checking.Quote from: CryptSafe on June 09, 2023, 04:02:19 PM~Snipped Quote from: Mpamaegbu on June 09, 2023, 03:13:28 PM~Snipped Quote from: Charles-Tim on June 08, 2023, 02:37:42 PMHe is good the last time I got in touch with him this year, he has other things he is doing that is taking his time. Hello Everyone, Nelson4lov here once again. Thanks to Charles-Tim for the heads up about this thread. I'm alive amd well - I haven't been sick in a long time. So a lot of things happened in the past year and some changes with led to my absence here on the forum. For one, I just bagged a B.Sc in computer science - First in my family and it was possible because of the opportunities this forum and Bitcoin gave to me. It was really hard but God made it possible and I'm done now (Internal and external defense) couldn't be more happier.Secondly, I've been playing around with a lot of development stuff lately and that has been taking my time. My final year project was a blockchain based system that I built on Celo blockchain and it was fine so moving forward, I would keep doing that in addition to reviving my activities here on the forum. That, and figuring out my next move/plan in life now I can finally tick B.Sc off my wish-list. Thanks to everyone who cared/noticed my absence (everyone I tagged and others I couldn't tag - I'm still rusty with the quotes)Â   â€“ Thanks once again. I appreciate you all.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Quote from: nelson4lov on June 10, 2023, 12:58:18 AMI just bagged a B.Sc in computer science - First in my family and it was possible because of the opportunities this forum and Bitcoin gave to me. It was really hard but God made it possible and I'm done now (Internal and external defense) couldn't be more happier.This na good news bro. I happy for you on how you still don use dis area grab something join your body on to say tomorrow still dey pregnant, make we no relax say na here be full stop because many things still dey to achieve.I happy say your face still show.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: There could be many reasons to why you will discover a user account not being active for so long, some may be due to being banned, some might have decided to leave the forum, some might have also been engage in more activities that renders them no time to be chanced to visit the forum, the thing here is that things must change, people are coming onboard here everyday to bitcointalk, will some time are leaving while some are staying, because we all have different reasons why we come on board, maybe if such user have some close friends they could actually tell more about him and his whereabout.As for Nelson4lov, welcome back, i guess the tag on your name ressurected you from a long time deep sleep back to the forum

comments.author: nelson4lov
comments.body: Quote from: Doan9269 on June 10, 2023, 01:30:37 PMAs for Nelson4lov, welcome back, i guess the tag on your name ressurected you from a long time deep sleep back to the forumÂ  Thanks my gee. I appreciate. Been a long time coming. Happy to be back to the community especially now that things are moving fast and wild - FG USD unification, financial bill 2023 and the Nigerian SEC ban on Binance Nigeria.

comments.author: Kelward
comments.body: Quote from: nelson4lov on June 10, 2023, 03:17:45 PMQuote from: Doan9269 on June 10, 2023, 01:30:37 PMAs for Nelson4lov, welcome back, i guess the tag on your name ressurected you from a long time deep sleep back to the forumÂ  Thanks my gee. I appreciate. Been a long time coming. Happy to be back to the community especially now that things are moving fast and wild - FG USD unification, financial bill 2023 and the Nigerian SEC ban on Binance Nigeria. Welcome back, na your papa born you, as dem just de ask about your whereabout, na so you just show face, your own no go pass you by. The love for dis naija board no get mate, for anonymous forum like dis, I no know say members go send if dem no see another member activities for a while, unto say you fit no even know di member personally. Dis your matter don make me understand say no be all about bitcoin discussions and economics matter, we dey also show concern for member.Congratulations on your achievements since wen you comot for di forum. Good to have you back.

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: OP, e go good make you lock dis thread since d guyman wey dem dey ask after don appear here to tell us sey everywhere dey ok for im side. Nothing dey bite am.

comments.author: Mr.right85
comments.body: Quote from: Gozie51 on June 08, 2023, 11:58:49 AMHope all is well with him?Just checking.Chaii, is baba, u don do well. U don exhibit true patriotism nd show say, dis forum way we dey so, we knw our own, we value our own nd we tak ourselves as one. Na so e suppose be nd as u reason ask like dis, evn en subconsciousness go tell am say, en get pple somewhere wey dey reason 3n matter nd dem nevr 4get am.Quote from: Charles-Tim on June 08, 2023, 02:37:42 PMHe is good the last time I got in touch with him this year, he has other things he is doing that is taking his time. U kwa dis senior man, u don do well. Say u take d relations in a way way b say, being inactiv on forum noel say connection don end. U do well.Dis small talk way u talk now go don calm many minds. Nw way pple dok lnw say, there persn dey okay, evry bodi don dey.Na so we go dey do am.
